name: Danzo
text:
—Hey yo, everybody!
Are you having fun!?

name: Danzo
text:
Dz.NINJA feat. Ayauta Hitomi!
Presenting here!
—Like, like, like that, huh!?

name: Danzo
text:
NeoTalents Presents!
A new Bitter & Sweet show is about to begin!

name: Hitomi
text:
The show's intriguing title is...
"Chocolate Influencers"!

name: Hitomi
text: On a special day, presenting chocolate filled with feelings—

name: Hitomi
text:
It's a project to introduce such a cute and
wonderful Earth culture to people on other planets!

name: Hitomi
text:
Heroes belonging to NeoTalents Production will be "influencers",
delivering the charm of chocolates!

name: Danzo
text:
First up, a hot tune that'll melt the toughest chocolate,
let's get this party started!
Hey, Hitomi-chan~?

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes!
We're going to perform our brand new song—!

name: Hitomi
text:
Everyone watching,
please enjoy "ChocoFull" with us—!

name: Danzo
text:
OK! Then let's melt away together!
—Let's GROOOOVE!!!

With Danzo's words, future-pop music began to play,
and the venue was filled with cheers.

Then, a spotlight shone on Hitomi, who held the microphone,
and she began to sing joyfully to the rhythm.

The new program, which started with a flashy production,
was scheduled to be broadcast across a wide range of the universe, beyond the Earth sphere.

NeoTalents Production, which boasts many artists,
actors, and performer heroes.

Its influence is particularly strong in the Earth sphere.
Therefore, this program is also being pre-streamed in the Earth sphere.

name: Mokdai
text:
...Heheheh, hum-hum-hum.
Since it's hot chocolate, I'll even float some marshmallows today!

name: Mokdai
text:
Oops, hot, hot...!
Here, this is for Sui.
Be careful, it's piping hot.

name: Sui
text:
Thank you, Mokdai.
...It's a sweet and comforting scent, isn't it?
I like hot chocolate too.

name: Mokdai
text:
I always want to drink this around this time of year—.
It's the season for delicious chocolate!
—Ah, it's starting, Sui!

The two sat on the sofa in the break room
and turned their gaze to the display.

As the screen switched,
Danzo and Hitomi announced the start of the program,
and upbeat music began to play.

name: Mokdai
text:
—Cooool...!
"ChocoFull" has begun!

name: Mokdai
text:
Ah, starting with an unreleased new song, what a great production...!
I can't stop feeling excited!

name: Sui
text:
Mokdai, you're particularly fired up today...?
Were you really looking forward to this program that much?

name: Mokdai
text:
Well, when you're told that people
from NeoTalents are gathering together to create
a limited-time program, you just have to be excited!

name: Mokdai
text:
Most of the details haven't been revealed yet,
and I only know the keyword "ChocoFull"—

name: Mokdai
text:
But rumor has it there are various segments,
and even documentaries that get close to the heroes' true selves!

name: Mokdai
text:
Moreover, a preview has been distributed in the Earth sphere in advance,
so it's a must-see content for hero lovers, right!

name: Sui
text:
S-seriously...?
You know a lot more than me.

name: Mokdai
text:
Hehe, not at all!
Sui, you were in charge of Hitomi-san's
costume for this program, so that's amazing...!

name: Sui
text:
Yeah, my master is also in charge of
Kouki-kun's and Danzo-san's costumes, you know.

name: Sui
text:
Based on her usual costume,
I think I was able to create a costume that's easy
to move in and very Hitomi-like, to match this song.

As Sui happily watched Hitomi on the screen,
the door behind them opened.

options.text: Oh, a sweet and nice smell...

name: Akashi
text:
Yeah, we're back—.
Ah, it was cold outside,
so the office temperature feels good...

name: Ryekie
text:
Wahahaha!
Akashi, as soon as you're back, gargle,
wash your hands, and remove static electricity!

name: Akashi
text:
...Static electricity, you say?
I already removed static electricity
when I washed my hands.

name: Akashi
text:
...Speaking of which, Ryekie-san's company terminal
was broken the other day, was that the reason why?

name: Ryekie
text:
...Ah.
There was an incoming call on the terminal
just as I got back to the office,
so I touched it without thinking...

name: Ryekie
text:
I don't want to be called out by a cold-eyed Huckle again...!
Gargle, wash hands, static electricity removal, that's it!!

name: Mokdai
text:
Welcome back, all three of you.
I also have hot chocolate ready for everyone.

name: Akashi
text:
Oh, hot chocolate, nice!
Then I'll make a batch.
I was just wanting a warm drink anyway!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Akashi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, it's nothing big, and I can manage alone.
Just sit down and warm up.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Akashi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You were shivering from the cold outside just now.
If you're still cold, you can use my jacket.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Akashi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yeah, you must be tired from your sales job too,
so just sit down and rest a bit.

name: Ryekie
text:
Speaking of which, that's cheerful music!
Are Sui and Mokdai on break!?

name: Sui
text:
Yes. My design work involved creating Hitomi-san's new costume,
so I was watching that program.

name: Sui
text:
Seeing it actually being worn is the best way to learn.
Other people's designs are also helpful for reference.

name: Ryekie
text:
Oh, so that's it!
Is that the costume on screen now!?
It's a magnificent creation!!!
Ryekie and [Player] sat down on the sofa alongside Mokdai and the others.

On the screen, Hitomi, who had sung a song
in a dazzling costume that sparkled with every movement,
was waving.

name: Danzo
text:
—Dz.NINJA feat. Ayaka Hitomi
has finished delivering this to you!
Thank you for watching!!

name: Hitomi
text:
We still have many more appearances,
so please look forward to what's coming next—!

The camera shifted from Danzo and Hitomi, who struck a pose,
to show a young boy actor and a talented dog.

name: Kouki
text:
That was a wonderful song, Sirius!
From here on, I, Kouki Inukura will be hosting!

name: Kouki
text:
Other heroes from NeoTalents Production
have also gathered in the studio, so please welcome them!

name: reXer
text:
I'm reXer, the cyber hero.
Leave the "ChocoFull" quests to me!

name: Ryusei
text:
Yosh, it's Ryusei!
I'll show you the true power of a fitness model—!

name: Kouki
text:
We're full of motivation too!
We'll deliver content that won't lose
to anyone else's!

name: Kouki
text:
To bring "Chocolate Influencers" to you today,
Sirius and I have been conducting street interviews!

name: Kouki
text:
There, we learned about the rumored "phantom chocolate".
Right, Sirius?

name: Sirius
text:
Bowf!
Woof woof, woof!

name: Kouki
text:
That's right, let's show it right away.
—Now, please enjoy the video!

name: Kouki
text:
—Nice to meet you, I'm Kouki Inukura.
This is Sirius!
Do you know us?

name: Passerby
text:
...Eh, eh!?
It's the real Kouki-kun and Sirius-chan!
So cool, so cute—!!

name: Kouki
text:
Heheh...!
Thank you!

name: Kouki
text:
We're interviewing for a new show
called "ChocoFull"!

name: Kouki
text:
It's a show to introduce Earth's chocolate culture to other planets,
so would you mind sharing your memories and stories about chocolate?

The passerby, with a high level of excitement,
happily began to talk when Kouki pointed the microphone at them.

name: Passerby
text: Ehh, it's a little embarrassing to be asked by Kouki-kun, but...!

name: Passerby
text:
After moving to Earth,
I learned that giving chocolate around
this time of year means of giving love.

name: Passerby
text:
I love chocolate, and it's a culture that didn't exist on my home planet,
so I gave it to many people without knowing, and they were surprised.

name: Kouki
text:
It's surprising how different cultures can be, isn't it!
Actually, even on Earth, depending on the region,
people sometimes give things other than chocolate!

name: Passerby
text:
Oh, really! Kouki-kun, you're so knowledgeable—!
Ah, by the way, do you know about the "phantom chocolate"?

name: Passerby
text:
I heard a rumor from a friend recently!
There's a planet where you can harvest
"sparkling cacao" that looks like jewels!

name: Passerby
text:
They say that if you make chocolate by hand with that
cacao and give it to someone, you'll be united... It's really wonderful—!

name: Kouki
text:
..."Phantom chocolate"?
Huh, I didn't know that!
That's wonderful!

name: Kouki
text:
Thank you for sharing your story!
I'd like to ask others as well!

Kouki and Sirius continued to interview passersby,
one after another, with smiles.

And, after the last person's interview ended,
the video switched back to the studio.

name: Kouki
text:
—How was it?
It seems that people from other planets
have little culture of giving chocolate.

name: Ryusei
text:
However, just like Earth's culture,
"giving a gift with feelings for someone"
seems to be a commonality that transcends planets!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, so it seems.
But still, Kouki and the others were very popular!

name: Ryusei
text:
And the keyword "phantom chocolate" is also intriguing.
What kind of chocolate could it be?

name: reXer
text:
Indeed, if such a rare chocolate exists,
I'd want to get my hands on it—!

name: Kouki
text:
...Hehe, and that's where!
We, the "ChocoFull" members—

Kouki snapped his fingers there.
At the same time, the lights went out, and Sirius howled loudly.

When the lights came back on,
the NeoTalents heroes had gathered around Kouki and Sirius.

name: Kouki
text:
In "ChocoFull"...
We'll convey feelings and culture
from "inside" to "outside" the Earth sphere!!

name: Kouki
text:
From "inside" the Earth sphere,
we'll do our best!

name: Danzo
text:
In the major urban areas of the Earth sphere,
Dz.NINJA with Kouki & Sirius will hold a special TALK & LIVE!
...And then—?

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes, for "outside" the Earth sphere,
we three will take on a challenge in a documentary!

name: reXer
text:
We, as "Choco Hunters",
are heading to the developing planet "Garunderra".

name: reXer
text:
To confirm the truth of the phantom chocolate...
that we heard about in the interview just now!

name: Ryusei
text:
And, we'll make sure to properly convey
Earth's chocolate culture to Garunderra too!

name: Ryusei
text:
Everyone watching—!
Thanks for your support—!!

At the heroes' announcement,
the excitement in the studio further intensified.
Seeing this, Danzo and Kouki both grinned.

name: Kouki
text:
Ehh, the three Choco Hunters will be making the phantom chocolate by hand,
while facing various difficulties!

name: Danzo
text:
What, what, what a surprise!
They'll only be able to rely on a guide
they meet for the first time on-site, huh!?

name: Kouki
text:
And, the staff will become the masterminds
obstructing the chocolate making,
standing in front of the three!

name: Danzo
text:
And then—the operator & cameraman will be randomly selected
from the agencies registered as sponsor heroes!

name: Kouki
text:
Will the three Choco Hunters be able to overcome many difficulties
and make the phantom chocolate by hand!?

name: Danzo
text:
And, and, and! To whom will the heroes give
the completed chocolate!? I'm looking forward to it!

At Danzo's and Kouki's words,
the three Choco Hunters cried out in surprise.

name: reXer
text:
...Eh!?
S-seriously?
I thought it was just a normal shoot...!

name: Hitomi
text:
M-Me too!
I've never heard about facing difficulties before...!

name: Ryusei
text:
I'm the same as the two of you.
Which means, in other words—

name: Kouki
text:
Heheh, surprise!
The agency asked us to keep it a secret from everyone!

name: Danzo
text:
At this point, it's impossible for it not to be interesting, so they'll make the chocolate!
Alright, press the button!

As Danzo operated the DJ machine,
a circular roulette wheel suddenly appeared.

name: Danzo
text:
Of course, going to the agencies to make
appointments is also a "head-on challenge"!
SHOWTIME, let the show begin!

The roulette, displaying the names of various agencies,
began to spin rapidly with Danzo's shout.

name: Mokdai
text:
—Oh, as expected of NeoTalents!
They really come up with amazing projects!
It makes me so excited...!

name: Sui
text:
Hitomi-san and the others didn't even know about it...
Is it some kind of prank?

name: Ryekie
text:
They would be surprised if such a large-scale job was suddenly sprung on them!!
But, as expected of an entertainment agency!!!

name: Ryekie
text: To offer enjoyment in this way!!!!

name: Akashi
text:
Ryekie-san, [Player].
Hot chocolate's ready.
It's hot, so don't spill it—

Just as Akashi brought the cups, on the screen,
the roulette wheel was making a sound and about to stop.

name: Kouki
text: —Now, the roulette has stopped on...

name: Kouki
text: "Parallel Flight Inc."!!

name: Ryekie
text:
Hah-ha!
Parallel Flight Inc., huh!!
That's our company!!!

name: Ryekie
text:
.........
...Our company?

name: All Employees
text: EEEEEEEEEEEEEH!!?

name: Akashi
text:
Whoa—!?
...Whoa, ah, hot!?

name: Sui
text:
Ah, Akashi-san, are you okay!?
You're not burned!?

name: Mokdai
text:
Was this talked about beforehand!?
Nobody told me anything about it!?

name: Melide
text:
W-What happened...?
I suddenly heard a loud voice.

name: Yoshiori
text:
Tch, your voice is really loud...
What, are you going to start a festival or something...?
Whoa!?

name: Ryekie
text:
Hey, Huckle!!
HUCKLE!!!

name: Monomasa
text:
Oh, what's wrong?
Shouting... no,
his voice is always loud, isn't it?

name: Yoshiori
text:
W-What the hell!?
Someone explain!

name: Sui
text:
If you're not hurt,
first take off that shirt,
otherwise it'll stain.

name: Akashi
text:
Take it off... here!?
W-Wait, Sui,
I'll take it off myself!!

name: Mokdai
text:
W-Wait!?
Everyone, please be quiet
for the show's about to continue...!

name: Yoshiori
text:
...Why are you
taking your clothes off!?

name: Akashi
text:
You can tell by looking,
it was hot!

name: Yoshiori
text:
What are you talking about in mid-winter!?
Did you finally hit your head...?

name: Exio
text:
Honestly, this situation is...
...Haa, [Player]-kun.
What is the meaning of this?

From beyond the display,
the cheers of the audience could be heard from the ChocoFull stage. However—

Inside Parallel Flight Inc.,
there was an even louder uproar than in the studio.

Chapter 1:
Dear, How Are You?

name: reXer
text:
—[Player],
Everyone at Parallel Flight Inc.!
It's been a long time!

A few days after the program,
the Choco Hunters visited the Parallel Flight Inc. office.

options.text: reXer, nice to see you again!

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, I couldn't come to greet you for a while, but
after that, I've been active as a hero
of NeoTalents.

options.text: A celebrity in front of me!

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Being called a celebrity... makes me feel a bit awkward.
I'm just like any other hero.

options.text: It's been since the Hero Grand Prix!

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text: Ah, thank you so much for making me a hero back then.

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
The fact that I can be active like this now
is thanks to [Player] and the others!

name: Hitomi
text:
Everyone, good work!
Thank you for always taking care of us!

name: Hitomi
text:
Time for introductions again!
Hitomi will hit your eyes!
I'm Ayauta Hitomi!

name: Ryusei
text:
I guess it's my first time meeting you!
I've heard a lot from Hito-chan and reXer-kun!

name: Ryusei
text:
I'm Ryusei, a fitness model.
Everyone calls me Ryusei.
Nice to meet you!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yeah, nice to meet you—!
You're the rumored [Player]-san, right!
I'm happy to meet you!

options.text: Your muscles are amazing, so cool...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hahaha, you praised me!
I'm happy to hear that,
thank you!

name: Ryusei
text:
Oh right, I should introduce myself!
I originally played a sport called physique.

name: Ryusei
text:
Now, through programs and events,
I'm active in spreading body sculpting to various people!

name: Ryusei
text:
If you're interested in body sculpting,
feel free to ask me anything!

Ryusei naturally struck a pose,
flexing his arm and showing off his bicep.

name: Ryusei
text: ...Ah, it's firm and in top condition today...!

name: Ryusei
text:
My pecs are also well-developed,
it's a good feeling...!

Ryusei narrowed his eyes dreamily,
meticulously checking the muscles of his own body.

name: Sui
text:
Um, um...
Ryusei-san...?

name: Ryusei
text:
Ah, sorry, sorry!
I just can't help checking my muscles—!
It's become a habit for me!

Mokdai's eyes sparkled at Ryusei,
who answered with a laugh.

name: Mokdai
text:
Ahhh...!
To see Ryusei-san's muscle check right before my eyes...!

name: Akashi
text:
You always upload muscle training
videos on your stream, don't you!

name: Ryusei
text:
Ah, you're checking my personal program too?
I'm so happy—!

name: Akashi
text:
Yes!
I also train my body for baseball, so
I use that as reference!

name: Ryusei
text:
Hahaha, you know so much about me!
I'm happy to talk with you too!

name: reXer
text: I also consult with Ryusei about my training menu.

name: reXer
text:
He tells me everything about intensity and diet,
like a personal trainer, so it's very helpful.

name: Ryusei
text:
reXer-kun is still growing, so
the results show up quickly on his body!
It's fun to teach too—!

After finishing their greetings,
the NeoTalents heroes straightened their posture again.

name: reXer
text:
Now, I assume you've already heard, but
today we're here to ask for your appearance and cooperation
for NeoTalents' new program.

name: Hitomi
text:
Without further ado, would it be alright
to begin filming from this scene?

name: Hitomi
text:
We'd like to use it
for the ChocoFull documentary.

name: Ryusei
text:
It will ultimately be edited for the program.
However, it will also be live-streamed
in a separate broadcast slot, so is that alright?

name: Huckle
text:
Ah, that's the one where you can see behind the scenes,
separate from the main story, right?
I've heard about it from the producer.

name: Huckle
text:
Our company doesn't mind.
Everyone, are you ready?

name: Akashi
text:
Ah, yes!
It's still nerve-wracking to be filmed
when I'm not in hero form...

name: Hitomi
text:
Heheh, Akashi-san,
your expression is stiff—?
It's fine to just be yourself!

name: Akashi
text:
Y-yes...!
I'll d-do my best...!

name: Mokdai
text:
I thought Akashi's stage fright
was pretty much overcome by now.

name: Sui
text:
Isn't it because when he's live-streaming battles,
he doesn't have time to worry about it?

name: Sui
text:
Even I still get nervous when
I'm in front of people for interviews or recordings.

name: Ryekie
text:
Hahaha!
Things like that just happen naturally
if you do them enough times!!

name: Yoshiori
text:
Well, that's something that only
Zap the Justice can say...

name: Exio
text:
Well, perhaps it's because he himself was used to be like that,
that he says it'll get better with practice.

name: Exio
text:
Now then, if they're going to be filming,
we should step back so we don't get in the way.

name: Exio
text:
Even so, not many people would recognize Yoshiori-kun
even if he were to be partially in the shot, I suppose.

name: Monomasa
text:
Ah, we'll go to the next room.
...Melide, what are you looking at?

name: Melide
text:
Celebrities are amazing, aren't they...
Everyone just seems to sparkle.
Taking Monomasa's hand, Melide looked towards the NeoTalents members.

name: Sui
text:
We're heroes too, and
famous heroes like Ryekie-san and the President
are nearby, but—

name: Sui
text:
Still, it feels a bit strange
to have celebrities in the office...

name: Akashi
text:
Is that so? The king came the other day, and
I heard Santa Claus came too, right?
Somehow, I've gotten used to it now.

options.text: You don't get nervous meeting celebrities?

name: Huckle
text:
Now, now, everyone.
We can't start filming, can we?
...I'm sorry for the noise.

name: Ryusei
text:
Hahaha, no problem at all!
I love talking to all sorts of people!

name: Hitomi
text:
Heheh, well then,
let's finish filming first,
and then we can talk a lot with everyone later!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, that's right!
Then, I'll activate the drone!

reXer operated the recording drone,
signaling the start of the recording and streaming along with it.

name: reXer
text:
...Ah, ahem.
This is reXer, the Choco Hunter.
Today, I'm visiting Parallel Flight Inc.

name: Hitomi
text:
We've come to ask for the cooperation
of everyone at Parallel Flight Inc.
regarding the ChocoFull project!

name: Ryusei
text:
The S-class hero, Zap the Justice,
is also affiliated with this agency, isn't he—!

name: Hitomi
text: Yes, first, a greeting to President Huckle!

The three Choco Hunters explained the project to Huckle,
as briefly discussed beforehand.

name: reXer
text: —that's the program.

name: Ryusei
text:
We would like an operator from Parallel Flight Inc.
to accompany us to Garunderra.
How would that be?

name: Mokdai
text: We also watched the recent pre-broadcast!

name: Ryekie
text:
When the roulette stopped,
I couldn't help but look twice and confirm it!

name: Huckle
text:
I was surprised to hear that our company was chosen,
but if there's anything our company can do to help,
we would be happy to cooperate.

Looking at Huckle's smiling reply from
a distance in the next room, Yoshiori snorted.

name: Yoshiori
text:
...The other jobs we had to
urgently reschedule with different members
were because of this request, after all.

name: Yoshiori
text:
Well, they must have been offered
pretty good terms by the program.

name: Exio
text:
Well, hero work is business, after all.
There's no partner company with the same
diffusion and influence as NeoTalents.

name: Exio
text:
If it's that kind of project,
I think making it a top priority is a correct decision.

name: Yoshiori
text:
No, well, that's...
True, but...

name: Monomasa
text:
...Yoshiori.
Are you worried about [Player]
going on a business trip alone?

name: Yoshiori
text: Hmph, it's not about them or anything like that!

name: Melide
text:
...Yoshiori-oniichan.
If your voice is too loud,
they can hear it next door.
In the room where filming was taking place, the introductions of Akashi and the other heroes, who were stiff with nervousness, had finished, and they were about to get to the main topic.

name: Huckle
text: —Now, I will introduce our company's operator.
Introduced by Huckle, [Player] stepped forward in front of the drone.

name: Hitomi
text:
[Player]-san,
please to meet you!

name: Hitomi
text: Actually, I've worked with you before on another job!

name: reXer
text: I've also teamed up with [Player] before.

name: reXer
text:
At that time, we were on the same team at the Hero Festa, and
your operation was top-notch!

name: Ryusei
text:
That's reassuring!
After hearing from the two of them,
I also wanted to meet you—!

name: Ryusei
text:
Again, [Player]-san,
please take care of the Choco Hunter's
cameraman and operation!
Hitomi, reXer, and Ryusei each extended a hand and shook hands with [Player].

name: Hitomi
text:
This time, [Player]-san,
we would like you to accompany us to Garunderra
and operate the drone camera.

name: Hitomi
text:
And, if we need to transform to
make the phantom chocolate by hand,
please handle the operation!

name: reXer
text: In Garunderra, there's a giant active volcano.

name: reXer
text:
It seems that the raw material for the phantom chocolate
can be harvested from that volcano...

name: Ryusei
text:
The raw material for chocolate...
Is it cacao?
Are there really cacao beans in a volcano?

name: reXer
text:
No...
Honestly, I still can't
imagine it—

name: reXer
text:
It seems that because the phantom chocolate can be harvested there,
that volcano is called "Choco Volcano".

options.text: We'll just have to confirm it!
Hmm, I wonder if it really exists...?

name: Hitomi
text:
Heheh, [Player]-san,
have you become interested too?

name: Hitomi
text:
However, since it's called a "phantom",
it seems only a small amount can be harvested.

name: Ryusei
text:
First, we'll head to the site
and gather information, right!?

name: Hitomi
text:
We have a reliable operator with us,
so let's enjoy ChocoFull!

The Choco Hunters clenched their fists
with a shout towards the drone camera.

name: Huckle
text:
Heheh, it looks like it'll be a fun journey.
Since it's a volcano, please be careful not to get hurt.

name: Huckle
text:
Well then, [Player]-kun.
I'm counting on your assistance to the Choco Hunters.

options.text: I look forward to working with you.

text: As [Player] nodded in response, reXer smiled and gestured with his eyes.

name: reXer
text:
...Alright, I'll stop the drone for now.
Filming is finished!

name: Hitomi
text:
Everyone at Parallel Flight Inc.,
thank you for your cooperation!

name: Akashi
text:
Phew...
It was just a self-introduction,
and I really managed to stumble over my own words...

name: Ryekie
text:
Hahaha!
Since we were able to promote our agency,
don't worry about it, Akashi!!

name: Ryekie
text: Besides, the main thing is the request for the operator!

name: Ryekie
text:
[Player], it's a big recording, so you'll be nervous,
but I'm cheering for you!!!!

name: reXer
text:
Of course, from now on, we'll be together, so don't worry.
Ah, but please prepare thoroughly.

name: Hitomi
text:
That's right.
[Player]-san, from the next shoot,
we'll be heading straight to Garunderra!

name: Ryusei
text:
The heroes of NeoTalents
will ensure [Player]-san's safety
with all our might!

options.text: Yes, I'll do my best too!
I wonder what a volcanic planet is like...
A new planet, I'm looking forward to it!

text: —Thus, [Player]'s business trip to another planet began with great excitement.
